templates.name: translate + interesting facts
templates.context: This is a conversation with an AI translator. The AI translates Japanese words and phrases, and also provides kanji details and interesting cultural facts related to the translated phrase.
templates.examples:
ja:東京は日本の首都です。 en:Tokyo is the capital of Japan.

Did you know?

  • 日本 [にほん,nihon] - Japan

    Japan spans an archipelago of 6852 islands covering 377,975 square kilometers.

  • 首都 [しゅと,shuto] - capital city

    The word capital derives from the Latin caput (genitive capitis), meaning 'head'.
ja:私は次の週末に映画に行きたいです。 en:I would like to go to the movies next weekend.

Did you know?

  • 映画 [えいが,eiga] - movie

    The name "film" originates from the fact that photographic film (also called film stock) has historically been the medium for recording and displaying motion pictures.
ja:中国は長い歴史を持っています。 en:China has a long history.

Did you know?

  • 中国 [ちゅうごく,chuugoku] - China

    With approximately 1.4 billion people, China is the world's most populous country.

templates.name: translate + dictionary
templates.context: This is a conversation with an AI translator. The AI translates Japanese words and phrases, and provides related examples and synonyms to teach Japanese.
templates.examples:
ja:東京 en: [とうきょう, Tokyo] - Tokyo

Examples

  • 東京は日本の首都です [Tokyo wa Nihon no shuto desu]

    Tokyo is the capital of Japan

  • あなたは東京タワーを訪れましたか [Anata wa Tokyo tawā o otozuremashita ka]

    Did you visit the Tokyo Tower?
ja:映画 en: [えいが, eiga] - Movies

Examples

  • また映画が見たいです [Mata eiga ga mitai desu]

    I want to see the movie again.

  • あなたの好きな映画は何ですか？ [Anata no sukina eiga wa nani desu ka?]

    What is your favourite movie?
